QuestData.Title: Hope They Can't Swim
QuestData.Description:
We've got a small boat docked right across the way there. If we can get these villagers safely on board, they should be able to make it to Fallhaven by river.
You're a capable fighter, no doubt. Can I count on you to fend off any attackers while we get them to safety?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend the villagers as they board the boat in the Timbered Strand.
QuestData.CompletionText: We can begin evacuating on your mark.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you, $c. Those villagers owe you their lives.
Now that they're safe, we can focus on taking back the town.
